Blog.post: well, it seems like 2 of my coolest friends are coming over to my place. (aint that nifty) we're currently going to practice jamming together with out guitars!, i can't wait. And i hope kates bass will work heh. In the morning i got the work headache but now its fine, ill continue with this post later, cheers

wow, its been a while since i posted X_x;;, ahh well... sooooo news you say? well... OH THATS RIGHT, I AM SEEING MUSE LIVE FOR MY VERY FIRST TIME! ISNT THAT EXCITING! well to you it might not, BUT TO ME HELL YEAH!. Thier concert at 10th of september another hmm 41 days? i think kates counting was right. 41 days sigh seems long but if you put it to 6 weeks , its not that long right!?!!?....... im going to post a picture of muse later a very pretty picture of muse ^^

Pull your arms up around your knees And hide out inside your room Pretend you can't feel at all Just realize that I know how you feel now If all I am is a distraction for you then I can't complain that you can't feel something for me Take all you can, find in me Can you think back to when things worked When dreams were the days you lived When you never cried alone Just realize that I know how you feel now If all I am is a distraction for you then I can't complain that you can't feel something for me Take all you can, find in me I know how (know how) You feel now (you feel now) If all I am is a distraction for you then I can't complain that you can't feel something for me Take all you can, find in me

Man im feelnig real bad. Actually shit. I let 3 of my closest friends lost trust from me. I have betrayed then for a stupid game...i can't beleive myself. Im so seflish for all i know of. I mean my friends were leaving the game and i wanted them to stay, so i wont be lonley. Man if you guys are reading this, you guys mean alot to me. And doohee i know, if you think im bullshitting about me saying all of this. I understand why. But you know how should i know what to think. Im a dumbass , you guys can call me heartless if you want. But i do care. You may think now i dont even care, but i do. Its just that i wasnt thinkin straight you know, i was selfish at that time and u guys can admit that. leo was going to shut down the server, and everyone was complaining. Bad rumours about ure server how wuold i know if they were true or not. But when asrim told me he was about to stay i felt lonley, then when u doohee left too, and moyga and everyone else, i felt so lonely. and yet i didnt want to beray leo so yeah...i understand. i know that i can't be friends with you like before. But i wish we still can, coz i still accpet u as who u were before. And i know ure thinkin twice about me now. I just wanted to say sorry. I know right now people hate me there but yeah i understand. and lai if your readin this im so sorry about what i said before. I couldnt think straight of what i was doing. I was upset and lonley, i was confused,. And i understand if u dont want to be frinds with me. And i understand if you both 3 dont want to be friends with me at the same level. and doohee if you think im still bullshitting about this then i understand. and i know i did the wrong thing. I know your ways of suffering. And that is to lose your friendship forever. or maybe losing friendship with both of you three. I just wanted to say im sorry and im sorry, hope we do get back all in ship shape. But i doubt it at this time at this state. Ill just wont ask for anything from you guys anymore, and i undertand if you can't trust me anymore. Becuase i know what i did was wrong.

well well well since imogen posted about it, made me want to talk about it... so the band well whos in it? well kate(bass) me( guitar) imogen (guitar) and supposingly elena i dunno what shes doing, we still need to find a drummer and a guy singer. Thing is IT WOULD MAKE US LOOK STUPID kinda, i think it will to have 5 guitarist and one bassist......? see the thing... man im so depressed right now ahahahah so gay. im bored, alone, at home, neva go out, im so anti social i need help. uhhhhhhhhhhhh KATE IMOGEN HULLOOO anyone home! man i probs make a party with ma old friend but doubt they come. Since their being a i dunno weird?! i dunno im just so depressed i cant think striaght. i feel like a double crosses since i am. sigh dear lord please help.

And infact it is!, im posting again since im terribly bored and have no sense of when it comes to stop going on the net....i consider myself as a freq... ahhh wellll.... i love thursday not the day but the "band" soo cool. And that is a true fact im gonna try and find a screenie of his fab guitar! i want one, not a crummy boring day to day usual starter one...UHHHH

since im sooo bored heres a little picture of "FUNERAL FOR A FRIEND" the best band i heard so far along with muse (thanks imogen ^^) im just soo bored, sigh* i went on ragnarok, got bored, went on gaia, got bored, thhheeeennn i decied to eat and still got bored. OMG I FEEL LIKE I WANT TO EAT PORK BUNS NOW UHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! EVEN BETTER MARS BARS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1OMGOMGOM IM LOSING CONTROL ......Breathe jess breathe! meh....i guess ill be running to the kitchen now grabing tiny teddies.

man i played ragnarok today and had a huge BITCH fight with one of the GM. I swear its not funny, hes accusing me of me saying hes a bretrayer when i didn't say anything. All i say was "OMG YOU KILLED MY ARCHER YOU MEANIE" i mean HOW CAN THAT POSSIBLY MAKE ME A BRETRAYER shessssh.... Well at least DR.Rob came to the rescue, hes actually a good doctor you know.... cooled me down heaps by spamming LIKE THIS ALL DAY on msn...but now im fine, just hope daniel fine *sigh*, right now IM WAITING FOR FUKIN LEO to come on.....the server keeps lagging all the way if hes not on *sigh again*...man i might eat breakfast
